TextBlock.Text: SPIRE: Oh, goodness. I believe we have found a secret hidden in the tower. I thought the pioneers would surely have removed it before they vacated from the tower to settle on the other islands...
CONOY: I suppose its discovery must have contributed to an even hastier decision to abandon the tower's use as a settlement. It's grown right through the chamber floors!
CONOY: I can't wait to tell our friends about this! I wonder how many others on the pilgrimage might have found this secret..
SPIRE: I cannot imagine most have - at least, not without knowing <color=orange>two quantum rules</color> ahead of time like you, Conoy!
